description.en: HGC (HiGameCoin) is an operation team in Singapore that serves technology development in the game market. A technology with rich experience in game algorithms, a large number of industry technical experts and authoritative technical consultants, providing the underlying technology engine and scientific algorithms for more than one game platform worldwide. The decentralized technical concept is used to perfectly apply the game mechanism, which has changed many technical difficulties such as uncertain factors and human interference, making the game more fair and transparent. Currently, the team has more than 30 members and dozens of senior technical developers, with an average age of more than 5 years. Nearly ten online products have been developed. Compared to traditional Internet companies that use ICO as the “last straw” for the purpose of “very clear”, HGC (HiGameCoin) has a very professional international team, combined with the global game market that has been immersed for many years, on blockchain technology. The understanding is very thorough and the project's ability to land is extremely advantageous.
